title: Fishing spot (cage, harpoon)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Fishing spots can be found throughout Gielinor typically at coastal areas or docks. They can be fished for raw lobster, raw tuna, raw swordfish or Big Swordfish depending on the tool used.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Fishing spot (cage, harpoon)
Fishing spot
Released11 June 2001 (Update)
MembersNo
RaceFish
LocationSee page
OptionsCage, Harpoon
ExamineI can see fish swimming in the water.
Advanced data
NPC ID1510,1519,1522,2146,3657,3914,5821,7199,7460,7465,7470,7946,9173,9174

Fishing spots can be found throughout Gielinor typically at coastal areas or docks. They can be fished for raw lobster, raw tuna, raw swordfish or Big Swordfish depending on the tool used.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
    • 1.1 Free to Play
    • 1.2 Members
  • 2 Cage
  • 3 Harpoon
    • 3.1 Main drops
    • 3.2 Conditional drops
  • 4 References

Fishing spot (cage, harpoon)
Level required 35
Fishing XPVaries
BaitNothing

Main drops[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
NothingN/ACommonN/AN/A
Raw tuna1Common5724
Raw swordfish1Common31848
Big swordfish(m)11/2,500Not sold1,500

The probability of receiving a raw tuna or a swordfish-type fish is shown in the plot below. Members have a 1/2500 chance of receiving a big swordfish instead of a raw swordfish.[1]
